input_text: Insurance providers encourage you to check your coverage as hurricane season begins HORRY COUNTY , SC ( WMBF ) - Experts say Tropical Storm Bonnie was just an early taste of what we could possibly see hit the South Carolina coast this hurricane season . They say the time to plan ahead and make sure your home and family are ready is now . Insurance agents especially want to make sure you ' re covered . They are encouraging you to check your policy , make sure it ' s updated , and that you have the right coverages and deductibles in place to protect you against loss . They say you should especially make an inventory of all of your belongings now before a storm is on the horizon . " These close calls , eventually , one ' s going to catch up with us and hit the Myrtle Beach area , " Wes Standish with Southern Coast Insurance Group said . They want to make sure you know that not every kind of hurricane damage can be covered with homeowners insurance alone . Only flood insurance can cover water that invades your home from the ground up , including storm surge .
entity_type_describe: A specific geographic area or position, which can be defined in terms of coordinates, address, or region.
